19 MainWindow::MainWindow(int argc, char** argv, QWidget *parent)
20  : QMainWindow(parent)
21  , qnode(argc,argv)
22 {
23  ui.setupUi(this);
24  setWindowIcon(QIcon(":/images/icon.png"));
25  QObject::connect(&qnode, SIGNAL(rosShutdown()), this, SLOT(close()));
26  qnode.init();
27  this->showMaximized();
28  loggingModel = new QStringListModel(this);
29  filters = new PclFilters();
30  filter_changed_flag = true;
31  init_ui_elemets();
32 }

42 void MainWindow::init_ui_elemets(){
43  ui.filter_selection_box->clear();
44  ui.filter_selection_box->addItem("PassThrough");
45  ui.filter_selection_box->addItem("VoxelGrid");
46  ui.filter_selection_box->addItem("Median");
47  ui.filter_selection_box->addItem("ShadowPoints");
48  ui.filter_selection_box->addItem("Normal Estimation");
49  ui.filter_selection_box->addItem("Statistical outlier removal");
50  ui.filter_selection_box->addItem("Plane model segmentation");
51  ui.filter_selection_box->addItem("ClusterExtraction");
52  ui.passthrough_input_3->addItem("x");
53  ui.passthrough_input_3->addItem("y");
54  ui.passthrough_input_3->addItem("z");
55  ui.run_action_button->setEnabled(false);
56  ui.reload_button->setEnabled(false);
57  ui.save_cloud_button->setEnabled(false);
58  ui.listView->setModel(loggingModel);
59 
60  w1 = new QVTKWidget();
61  w2 = new QVTKWidget();
62  viewer1.reset(new pcl::visualization::PCLVisualizer ("3D Viewer", false));
63  viewer2.reset(new pcl::visualization::PCLVisualizer ("3D Viewer", false));
64  w1->SetRenderWindow(viewer1->getRenderWindow());
65  w2->SetRenderWindow(viewer2->getRenderWindow());
66  viewer1->setCameraPosition( 0.146598, 0.0941454, -4.95334, -0.0857047, -0.0396425, 0.600109, -0.00146821, -0.999707, -0.0241453, 0);
67  viewer2->setCameraPosition( 0.146598, 0.0941454, -4.95334, -0.0857047, -0.0396425, 0.600109, -0.00146821, -0.999707, -0.0241453, 0);
68  ui.verticalLayout->addWidget(w1);
69  ui.verticalLayout_2->addWidget(w2);
70  ui.filter_selection_box->setEnabled(false);
71  hide_all_filter_inputs();
72 }
73 
74 void MainWindow::reset_sliders()
75 {
76  bool tmp = continously_update_filter_flag;
77  continously_update_filter_flag = false;
78  Q_EMIT on_filter_slider_1_valueChanged(50);
79  Q_EMIT on_filter_slider_2_valueChanged(50);
80  Q_EMIT on_filter_slider_3_valueChanged(50);
81  ui.filter_slider_1->setValue(50);
82  ui.filter_slider_2->setValue(50);
83  ui.filter_slider_3->setValue(50);
84  continously_update_filter_flag = tmp;
85 }
86 
87 void MainWindow::display_viewer_1(QString url)
88 {
89  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr displayCloud(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>);
90  if(pcl::io::loadPCDFile<pcl::PointXYZ>(url.toUtf8().constData(), *displayCloud) == -1)
91  {
92  print_to_logg("Could not load file");
93  return;
94  }
95  input_cloud = displayCloud;
96  viewer1 = filters->visualize(displayCloud);
97  w1->SetRenderWindow(viewer1->getRenderWindow());
98  viewer1->setCameraPosition( 0.146598, 0.0941454, -4.95334, -0.0857047, -0.0396425, 0.600109, -0.00146821, -0.999707, -0.0241453, 0);
99 }

101 void MainWindow::display_viewer_2(boost::shared_ptr<pcl::visualization::PCLVisualizer> viewer){
102  output_cloud = filters->get_filtered_cloud();
103  viewer2->getCameras(cam);
104  viewer2 = viewer;
105  w2->SetRenderWindow(viewer2->getRenderWindow());
106  viewer2->setCameraPosition(cam[0].pos[0],cam[0].pos[1],cam[0].pos[2],cam[0].view[0],cam[0].view[1],cam[0].view[2]);
107  filter_changed_flag = false;
108  ui.save_cloud_button->setEnabled(true);
109  ui.reload_button->setEnabled(true);
110 }

113 void MainWindow::print_filter_values(){
114  loggstring = "";
115  switch (ui.filter_selection_box->currentIndex()){
116  case 0:
117  // passthrough
118  loggstring.append("Passthrough parameters: ");
119  loggstring.append("Axis: ");
120  loggstring.append(ui.passthrough_input_3->currentText());
121  loggstring.append(", Min: ");
122  loggstring.append(QString::number(ui.filter_input_1->value()));
123  loggstring.append(", Max: ");
124  loggstring.append(QString::number(ui.filter_input_2->value()));
125  print_to_logg(loggstring);
126  break;
127  case 1:
128  // voxel grid
129  loggstring.append("Voxelgrid parameters: ");
130  loggstring.append("Voxel size: ");
131  loggstring.append(QString::number(ui.filter_input_1->value()));
132  print_to_logg(loggstring);
133  break;
134  case 2:
135  //median
136  loggstring.append("Median paramters: ");
137  loggstring.append("Window size: ");
138  loggstring.append(QString::number(round(ui.filter_input_1->value())));
139  loggstring.append(", Maximum allowed movement: ");
140  loggstring.append(QString::number(ui.filter_input_2->value()));
141  print_to_logg(loggstring);
142  break;
143  case 3:
144  //shadow point
145  loggstring.append("Shadow point removal paramters: ");
146  loggstring.append("Threshold: ");
147  loggstring.append(QString::number(round(ui.filter_input_1->value())));
148  loggstring.append(", Radius (normal search): ");
149  loggstring.append(QString::number(ui.filter_input_2->value()));
150  print_to_logg(loggstring);
151  break;
152  case 4:
153  //Normal estimation
154  loggstring.append("Normal estimation paramters: ");
155  loggstring.append("Radius (normal search): ");
156  loggstring.append(QString::number(ui.filter_input_1->value()));
157  loggstring.append(", Number of normals displayed: ");
158  loggstring.append(QString::number(ui.filter_input_2->value()));
159  print_to_logg(loggstring);
160  break;
161  case 5:
162  //statistical outlier removal
163  loggstring.append("Statistical outlier removal paramters: ");
164  loggstring.append("MeanK: ");
165  loggstring.append(QString::number(round(ui.filter_input_1->value())));
166  loggstring.append(", Standard deviation threshold: ");
167  loggstring.append(QString::number(ui.filter_input_2->value()));
168  print_to_logg(loggstring);
169  break;
170  case 6:
171  //segmentation test
172  break;
173  case 7:
174  //cluster extraction
175  break;
176  default:
177  break;
178  }
179 }
180 
181 void MainWindow::print_to_logg(QString msg){
182  QString tmp = "Logg: ";
183  tmp.append(msg);
184  loggingModel->insertRows(loggingModel->rowCount(),1);
185  loggingModel->setData(loggingModel->index(loggingModel->rowCount()-1), tmp);
186  ui.listView->scrollToBottom();
187 }
188 
189 void MainWindow::on_load_file_button_clicked(bool check){
190  QString fileName = QFileDialog::getOpenFileName(this, tr("Open File"),"/home/minions",tr("PointCload (*.pcd)"));
191  if(fileName.length() == 0)
192  {
193  //no file selected
194  loggstring = "No file selected";
195  print_to_logg(loggstring);
196  return;
197  }
198  loggstring = "Loading file from: ";
199  loggstring.append(fileName);
200  print_to_logg(loggstring);
201  ui.run_action_button->setEnabled(true);
202  ui.filter_selection_box->setEnabled(true);
203  display_viewer_1(fileName);
204  ui.filter_selection_box->setCurrentIndex(0);
205  Q_EMIT on_filter_selection_box_currentIndexChanged(0);
206 }
207 
208 void MainWindow::on_run_action_button_clicked(bool check){
209  loggstring = "";
210  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr cluster_cloud_rgb,plane_rgb;
211  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cluster_cloud, plane;
212  switch(ui.filter_selection_box->currentIndex()){
213  case 0:
214  // passthrough
215  if(filter_changed_flag){
216  display_viewer_2(filters->passthrough_vis(input_cloud,ui.filter_input_1->value(),ui.filter_input_2->value(),ui.passthrough_input_3->currentText().toStdString()));
217  }
218  else{
219  //update pointcloud in viewer2
220  viewer2->updatePointCloud(filters->passthrough(input_cloud,ui.filter_input_1->value(),ui.filter_input_2->value(),ui.passthrough_input_3->currentText().toStdString()),"sample cloud");
221  output_cloud = filters->get_filtered_cloud();
222  w2->update();
223  }
224 
225  break;
226  case 1:
227  //voxelGrid
228  if(filter_changed_flag){
229  display_viewer_2(filters->voxelgrid_vis(input_cloud,ui.filter_input_1->value(),ui.filter_input_1->value(),ui.filter_input_1->value()));
230  }
231  else{
232  viewer2->updatePointCloud(filters->voxelgrid(input_cloud,ui.filter_input_1->value(),ui.filter_input_1->value(),ui.filter_input_1->value()),"sample cloud");
233  output_cloud = filters->get_filtered_cloud();
234  w2->update();
235  }
236  break;
237  case 2:
238  //median
239  display_viewer_2(filters->median_vis(input_cloud,ui.filter_input_1->value(),ui.filter_input_2->value()));
240  break;
241  case 3:
242  //shadow points
243  display_viewer_2(filters->shadowpoint_vis(input_cloud,ui.filter_input_1->value(),ui.filter_input_2->value()));
244  break;
245  case 4:
246  //normal estimation
247  display_viewer_2(filters->normalsVis(input_cloud,ui.filter_input_1->value(),ui.filter_input_2->value()));
248  break;
249  case 5:
250  //statistical outlier removal
251  display_viewer_2(filters->statistical_outlier_vis(input_cloud,ui.filter_input_1->value(),ui.filter_input_2->value()));
252  break;
253  case 6:
254  //segmentation
255  plane = filters->plane_segmentation(input_cloud,ui.filter_input_1->value());
256  plane_rgb = filters->color_cloud(plane,255,0,0);
257  if(!ui.filter_checkbox_1->isChecked()){
258  //display plane and cloud
259  cluster_cloud_rgb = filters->color_cloud(input_cloud,255,255,255);
260  *cluster_cloud_rgb += *plane_rgb;
261  plane_rgb = cluster_cloud_rgb;
262 
263  }
264  display_viewer_2(filters->visualize_rgb(plane_rgb));
265  break;
266  case 7:
267  //cluster extraction
268  plane = filters->plane_segmentation(input_cloud,ui.filter_input_1->value());
269  cluster_cloud = filters->combine_clouds(filters->cluster_extraction(input_cloud,ui.filter_input_1->value()));
270  plane_rgb = filters->color_cloud(plane,255,0,0);
271  cluster_cloud_rgb = filters->color_cloud(cluster_cloud,0,0,255);
272  if(ui.filter_checkbox_1->isChecked()){
273  //add plane to the point cloud
274  *cluster_cloud_rgb += *plane_rgb;
275  }
276 
277  display_viewer_2(filters->visualize_rgb(cluster_cloud_rgb));
278  break;
279  default:
280  loggstring.append("Not implemented");
281  print_to_logg(loggstring);
282  break;
283  }
284 }
285 
286 void MainWindow::on_save_cloud_button_clicked(bool check){
287  QString savefile = QFileDialog::getSaveFileName(this,tr("Save cloud"),"/home/minions",tr("PointCloud (*.pcd)"));
288  if(savefile.length() != 0){
289  loggstring = "Saving file to: ";
290  loggstring.append(savefile);
291  pcl::io::savePCDFileASCII(savefile.toUtf8().constData(), *output_cloud);
292  print_to_logg(loggstring);
293  }
294  else{
295  print_to_logg("No file selected");
296  }
297 }
298 
299 void MainWindow::on_reload_button_clicked(bool check){
300  QString savefile = "/home/minions/temp_point_cloud.pcd";
301  print_to_logg("Reloading file...");
302  loggstring.append(savefile);
303  pcl::io::savePCDFileASCII(savefile.toUtf8().constData(), *output_cloud);
304  QString tmp = "Backup is located at: ";
305  tmp.append(savefile);
306  print_to_logg(tmp);
307  display_viewer_1(savefile);
308  print_filter_values();
309 }

311 void MainWindow::on_filter_selection_box_currentIndexChanged(int i){
312  hide_all_filter_inputs();
313  filter_changed_flag = true;
314  switch (i){
315  case 0:
316  // passthrough
317  continously_update_filter_flag = true;
318  ui.filter_input_1->setRange(-5,5);
319  ui.filter_input_2->setRange(-5,5);
320  ui.filter_input_1->setSingleStep(0.1);
321  ui.filter_input_2->setSingleStep(0.1);
322  ui.filter_input_1->setVisible(true);
323  ui.filter_input_2->setVisible(true);
324  ui.filter_slider_1->setVisible(true);
325  ui.filter_slider_2->setVisible(true);
326  ui.passthrough_input_3->setVisible(true);
327  ui.input_label_1->setText("Min:");
328  ui.input_label_2->setText("Max:");
329  ui.input_label_3->setText("Axis:");
330  break;
331  case 1:
332  // voxel grid
333  continously_update_filter_flag = true;
334  ui.input_label_1->setText("Voxel size");
335  ui.filter_input_1->setVisible(true);
336  ui.filter_slider_1->setVisible(true);
337  ui.filter_input_1->setSingleStep(0.001);
338  ui.filter_input_1->setRange(0.001,0.2);
339 
340  break;
341  case 2:
342  //median
343  continously_update_filter_flag = false;
344  ui.input_label_1->setText("Window size");
345  ui.input_label_2->setText("Movement");
346  ui.filter_input_1->setRange(0,80);
347  ui.filter_input_2->setRange(0.001,1);
348  ui.filter_input_1->setSingleStep(1);
349  ui.filter_input_2->setSingleStep(0.001);
350  ui.filter_input_1->setVisible(true);
351  ui.filter_input_2->setVisible(true);
352  ui.filter_slider_1->setVisible(true);
353  ui.filter_slider_2->setVisible(true);
354  break;
355  case 3:
356  //shadow point
357  continously_update_filter_flag = false;
358  ui.input_label_1->setText("Threshold");
359  ui.input_label_2->setText("Radius");
360  ui.filter_input_1->setVisible(true);
361  ui.filter_input_2->setVisible(true);
362  ui.filter_slider_1->setVisible(true);
363  ui.filter_slider_2->setVisible(true);
364  ui.filter_input_1->setRange(0,1);
365  ui.filter_input_2->setRange(0.001,0.5);
366  ui.filter_input_1->setSingleStep(0.001);
367  ui.filter_input_2->setSingleStep(0.001);
368  break;
369  case 4:
370  //normal estimation
371  continously_update_filter_flag = false;
372  ui.input_label_1->setText("Radius");
373  ui.input_label_2->setText("NumNormals");
374  ui.filter_input_1->setVisible(true);
375  ui.filter_input_2->setVisible(true);
376  ui.filter_slider_1->setVisible(true);
377  ui.filter_slider_2->setVisible(true);
378  ui.filter_input_1->setRange(0.001,0.5);
379  ui.filter_input_2->setRange(1,10);
380  ui.filter_input_1->setSingleStep(0.001);
381  ui.filter_input_2->setSingleStep(1);
382  break;
383  case 5:
384  //statistical outlier removal
385  continously_update_filter_flag = false;
386  ui.input_label_1->setText("MeanK");
387  ui.input_label_2->setText("StddevMulThresh");
388  ui.filter_input_1->setVisible(true);
389  ui.filter_slider_1->setVisible(true);
390  ui.filter_input_2->setVisible(true);
391  ui.filter_slider_2->setVisible(true);
392  ui.filter_input_1->setRange(1,100);
393  ui.filter_input_1->setSingleStep(1);
394  ui.filter_input_2->setRange(0.001,1);
395  ui.filter_input_2->setSingleStep(0.001);
396  break;
397  case 6:
398  //segmentation
399  continously_update_filter_flag = false;
400  ui.input_label_1->setText("Point distance");
401  ui.filter_input_1->setVisible(true);
402  ui.filter_slider_1->setVisible(true);
403  ui.filter_input_1->setRange(0.001,0.02);
404  ui.filter_input_1->setSingleStep(0.001);
405  ui.filter_checkbox_1->setText("Show only plane");
406  ui.filter_checkbox_1->setVisible(true);
407  break;
408  case 7:
409  continously_update_filter_flag = false;
410  ui.input_label_1->setText("Point distance");
411  ui.filter_input_1->setVisible(true);
412  ui.filter_slider_1->setVisible(true);
413  ui.filter_checkbox_1->setVisible(true);
414  ui.filter_checkbox_1->setText("Show plane");
415  ui.filter_input_1->setRange(0.001,0.02);
416  ui.filter_input_1->setSingleStep(0.001);
417  //cluster extraction
418  break;
419  default:
420  break;
421  }
422  reset_sliders();
423 }
424 
425 void MainWindow::on_filter_slider_1_valueChanged(int i){
426  double tmp = i/100.0;
427  if(ui.filter_input_1->minimum() < 0){
428  ui.filter_input_1->setValue(ui.filter_input_1->minimum()+(tmp*(abs(ui.filter_input_1->minimum())+abs(ui.filter_input_1->maximum()))));
429  }
430  else{
431  ui.filter_input_1->setValue(ui.filter_input_1->minimum()+(tmp*(ui.filter_input_1->maximum()-ui.filter_input_1->minimum())));
432  }
433  if(continously_update_filter_flag){
434  Q_EMIT on_run_action_button_clicked(true);
435  }
436 }
437 void MainWindow::on_filter_slider_2_valueChanged(int i){
438  double tmp = i/100.0;
439  if(ui.filter_input_2->minimum() < 0){
440  ui.filter_input_2->setValue(ui.filter_input_2->minimum()+(tmp*(abs(ui.filter_input_2->minimum())+abs(ui.filter_input_2->maximum()))));
441  }
442  else{
443  ui.filter_input_2->setValue(ui.filter_input_2->minimum()+(tmp*(ui.filter_input_2->maximum()-ui.filter_input_2->minimum())));
444  }
445  if(continously_update_filter_flag){
446  Q_EMIT on_run_action_button_clicked(true);
447  }
448 }

453  }
454  else{
455  ui.filter_input_3->setValue(ui.filter_input_3->minimum()+(tmp*(ui.filter_input_3->maximum()-ui.filter_input_3->minimum())));

480 void MainWindow::hide_all_filter_inputs(){
481  ui.filter_input_1->setVisible(false);
482  ui.filter_input_2->setVisible(false);
483  ui.filter_input_3->setVisible(false);
484  ui.filter_slider_1->setVisible(false);
485  ui.filter_slider_2->setVisible(false);
486  ui.filter_slider_3->setVisible(false);
487  ui.passthrough_input_3->setVisible(false);
488  ui.input_label_1->setText("");
489  ui.input_label_2->setText("");
490  ui.input_label_3->setText("");
491  ui.filter_checkbox_1->setVisible(false);
492 }
493 }
